history.content: I think it's kinda lame to blame Gradescope at this stage of the course.  --Eric

I just realized that I accidentally submitted the Bloom filter project report which was in PDF format using the "SUBMIT IMAGES" option of the Gradescope.

As a result of which it didn't assign which part of the document belongs to which page of the report.

However the report is very clear and readable on Gradescope so I hope it is fine with the instructors and TAs.

It is kinda a lame that Gradescope lets you upload the PDF as image and the default option is to upload the image and not PDF :-/
history.subject: Uploaded the project PDF as image
